biotools.summary: PDR (Pairwise Distance Reconstuction) is a genome assembly evaluation metric. It derives from a common concern in genetic studies, and takes completeness, contiguity, and correctness into consideration. PDRi is a implementation of it by integral.

bioschemas.name: PDR
bioschemas.summary: PDR (Pairwise Distance Reconstuction) is a genome assembly evaluation metric. It derives from a common concern in genetic studies, and takes completeness, contiguity, and correctness into consideration. PDRi is a implementation of it by integral.
